tweets: Your savings are evaporating in real time. The dollar lost 97% since 1913. Bitcoin gets scarcer every 4 years by design. One loses value by existing. One gains it. Choose.
From $0.03 to $66,435. Bitcoin went 221 million percent while the dollar silently eroded 97%. That's not luck. That's scarcity crushing inflation. One is broken money. One fixed it.
College athletes getting million-dollar NIL deals. If you put just 10% into Bitcoin and never touch it for 10 years, you're watching most of your peers squander generational wealth. Do the math.

topics: "Your keys, your Bitcoin. Not your keys, not your Bitcoin."
